title: Locked out of lobby
body:
Hit my promo's and got this screen when trying to join the first lobby, clicking accept/decline played the sounds but didn't seem to do anything, you can see the chat in the bottom left so it registered that I entered the lobby in some capacity. I could also hear some sounds coming through from the pick/ban phase but I guess once it got to me it just timed out as I couldn't pick anything, so yay immediate loss in my promos. Unfortunately I don't have any screen cap setup so couldn't get a recording but just wanted to bring this up in-case it's some ongoing issue.

[Lobby screencap incase the add link didn't work, I don't know how this forum works](https://imgur.com/a/WoAaEQW)

replies.body:
I've seen and heard of the issue before, but it's extremely intermittent. Honestly, I thought it had been fixed. It probably won't happen to you again, but if I could get some more info off you that would be great:

1. Windows or Mac?
2. Solo/Duo, Flex, 3v3?
3. Had you already played a game or was this your first since opening client?
4. Have you seen this issue before or is this the first time?

1. Windows
2. Solo/Duo
3. This was my second game since opening the client
4. First time seeing this issue
